goal.en: The main purpose of the text is to convey meteorological concepts in a visual and practical manner, while simultaneously providing students with a comprehensive background in basic meteorology and up-to-date information on important topics, such as global warming, ozone depletion, and El Niño.
goal.ch: The main purpose of the text is to convey meteorological concepts in a visual and practical manner, while simultaneously providing students with a comprehensive background in basic meteorology and up-to-date information on important topics, such as global warming, ozone depletion, and El Niño.

content.en:
Introduction: Global system,
The Earth’s Changing Climate,
Global climate and others,
Middle-Latitude Cyclones,
Air masses and fronts,
Weather forecasting,
Thunderstorms and Tornadoes,
Hurricanes,
PBL, Wind: Small scale and local systems,
Remote sensing,
Air pollution,
Stratosphere: Middle atmospheric Dynamics
